name: Murder On The Midnight
description:
Murder On The Midnight - @bryantmakesprog - BryantMakesPrograms.com

Murder On The Midnight is a procedurally generated murder mystery game. Upon entering the game you will appear on a train headed into station. Before the train arrives in station you must find the victim, question the passengers about their whereabouts throughout the trip, and piece together from these testimonies who the murderer is. Be sure not to accuse the wrong person though!

This is my second (and better) ProcJam '15 submission!

An online version can also be found on my website.
